articles.title: College hoops bad beat: Ridiculous finish sinks Kansas bettors, and under bettors too - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Jayhawks bettors didn't feel very good when the game ended Wednesday.
articles.content:
With about 10 seconds left, Kansas grabbed the ball, leading by 9. NC State didn't foul.
Somehow, Kansas didn't cover the 8.5-point spread.
Kansas was an 8- or 8.5-point favorite at BetMGM, dependi… [+1416 chars]

articles.title: FIFA opens proceedings against Mexican FA over fan chants in Poland draw - Reuters
articles.description: FIFA have opened proceedings against the Mexican Football Association following chants by the country's fans during Tuesday's 0-0 draw with Poland at the World Cup in Qatar, world soccer's governing body said on Wednesday.
